description: This file defines the top-level route component for the 'notes' feature in a Remix.run application. It manages authentication via a loader function and renders nested route content.

methods.name: loader
methods.description: A loader function that authenticates the user based on the request and redirects to login if unauthenticated.

methods.name: NotesLayout
methods.description: A React component that renders an Outlet for nested routes.
